HistoryManager

This extension is a productivity tool that shows you the top sites you visit and how often you visit them. This analytics and breakdown surface the top sites as well as one-hit wonders: sites that you only visited once.

The app currently allows you to view your browsing behaviour and history for one day, one week, one year, and all time. It will help you understand your browsing habits, what sites you spend time on, and help you build your self-control: you can only improve what you measure!
